resources.string: Provide extra information when stylus is hovering
Please move to device storage for better using experience
Some apps need to move back to device storage

"When you enable the incoming call lock feature, you must scan your fingerprint to answer a call. The call will be connected automatically when the fingerprint is successfully identified.
Please note that:
1.You can answer the incoming call directly from a paired Bluetooth headset or smart watch without scanning your fingerprint.
2.You still need to use your fingerprint to answer the call when using a wired headset.
3.You will not be able to answer the call from 3rd party incoming call screen.
4.For Voice over IP (VoIP) call, e.g. WhatsApp voice call, you should still answer the call from the app itself."
Answer incoming call with your fingerprint
Double-tap on the fingerprint sensor to launch the camera when the device is unlocked.
Tap and hold on the fingerprint sensor to answer incoming calls.
Enable snap call with your fingerprint
Tap on the fingerprint sensor to capture a photo when the camera is active.
"When incoming call lock feature is enabled, answering calls via tap and hold will be disabled."
Scroll automatically when the stylus is hovering over the edge of scrollable views
Ensure to install a high-quality SD card for a smooth data storage. To store data safely, please use an SD card from a reputable manufacturer.

This ^1 appears to be slow.

Consider using a faster ^1 for better performance.
Quickly open camera without unlocking your screen
Press power button twice for camera
Open the camera app by twisting your wrist twice
Keep apps running in the background so you can get notifications and updates on time.
The system has detected incompatible apps in this Android OS version. Contact the app developers for info or uninstall the apps.
vibrant RGB SRGB colour natural standard
Some apps may not properly display the texts with large/huge font size.
Slide the switch to the right, hold it for 5 seconds, then tap the notification to start pairing.
Reduces power consumption. Some notifications and updates may not be received in real time.
Hover and click 1<sup>st</sup> button on the Z Stylus to expand Quick launch panel.
There is a problem loading the manual.
It takes several minutes. Please wait.
The SD card size is too small. Please use a larger high-speed SD card.\n^1
Use as an internal storage for both apps and data
For installing apps to external storage. This requires formatting that prevents it from working with other devices.
Use as an internal storage for apps only

Move data to new <xliff:g example="SD card" id="name">^1</xliff:g> for more available storage to store your photos, files, and some apps. You can also choose to reserve space on <xliff:g example="SD card" id="name">^1</xliff:g> for installing apps.
Your new <xliff:g example="SD card" id="name">^1</xliff:g> is working.
Pause touch mode after Z Stylus leaves the screen
Swipe up the screen to wake up your device from idle mode.
To see other USB options, swipe down from the top of the screen, then tap the USB notification.
